00144 int
00145 Cudd_ReduceHeap(
00146   DdManager * table /* DD manager */,
00147   Cudd_ReorderingType heuristic /* method used for reordering */,
00148   int  minsize /* bound below which no reordering occurs */)
00149 {
00150     DdHook *hook;
00151     int result;
00152     unsigned int nextDyn;
00153 #ifdef DD_STATS
00154     unsigned int initialSize;
00155     unsigned int finalSize;
00156 #endif
00157     long localTime;
00158 
00159     /* Don't reorder if there are too many dead nodes. */
00160     if (table->keys - table->dead < (unsigned) minsize)
00161         return(1);
00162 
00163     if (heuristic == CUDD_REORDER_SAME) {
00164         heuristic = table->autoMethod;
00165     }
00166     if (heuristic == CUDD_REORDER_NONE) {
00167         return(1);
00168     }
00169 
00170     /* This call to Cudd_ReduceHeap does initiate reordering. Therefore
00171     ** we count it.
00172     */
00173     table->reorderings++;
00174 
00175     localTime = util_cpu_time();
00176 
00177     /* Run the hook functions. */
00178     hook = table->preReorderingHook;
00179     while (hook != NULL) {
00180         int res = (hook->f)(table,(void *)heuristic);
00181         if (res == 0) return(0);
00182         hook = hook->next;
00183     }
00184 
00185     if (!ddReorderPreprocess(table)) return(0);
00186     ddTotalNumberSwapping = 0;
00187     
00188 #ifdef DD_STATS
00189     initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00190     ddTotalNISwaps = 0;
00191 
00192     switch(heuristic) {
00193     case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM:
00194     case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM_PIVOT:
00195         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_RANDOM  ");
00196         break;
00197     case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT:
00198     case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT_CONVERGE:
00199     case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT:
00200     case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT_CONV:
00201     case CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT:
00202     case CUDD_REORDER_GROUP_SIFT_CONV:
00203         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_SIFTING ");
00204         break;
00205     case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW2:
00206     case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW3:
00207     case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW4:
00208     case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW2_CONV:
00209     case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW3_CONV:
00210     case CUDD_REORDER_WINDOW4_CONV:
00211         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_WINDOW  ");
00212         break;
00213     case CUDD_REORDER_ANNEALING:
00214         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_ANNEAL  ");
00215         break;
00216     case CUDD_REORDER_GENETIC:
00217         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_GENETIC ");
00218         break;
00219     case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR:
00220     case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR_CONVERGE:
00221         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_LINSIFT ");
00222         break;
00223     case CUDD_REORDER_EXACT:
00224         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_EXACT   ");
00225         break;
00226     default:
00227         return(0);
00228     }
00229     (void) fprintf(stdout,"%8d: initial size",initialSize); 
00230 #endif
00231 
00232     result = cuddTreeSifting(table,heuristic);
00233 
00234 #ifdef DD_STATS
00235     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00236     finalSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00237     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:F_REORDER %8d: final size\n",finalSize); 
00238     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:T_REORDER %8g: total time (sec)\n",
00239                    ((double)(util_cpu_time() - localTime)/1000.0)); 
00240     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:N_REORDER %8d: total swaps\n",
00241                    ddTotalNumberSwapping);
00242     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:M_REORDER %8d: NI swaps\n",ddTotalNISwaps);
00243 #endif
00244 
00245     if (result == 0)
00246         return(0);
00247 
00248     if (!ddReorderPostprocess(table))
00249         return(0);
00250 
00251     if (table->realign) {
00252         if (!cuddZddAlignToBdd(table))
00253             return(0);
00254     }
00255 
00256     nextDyn = (table->keys - table->constants.keys + 1) *
00257               DD_DYN_RATIO + table->constants.keys;
00258     if (table->reorderings < 20 || nextDyn > table->nextDyn)
00259         table->nextDyn = nextDyn;
00260     else
00261         table->nextDyn += 20;
00262     table->reordered = 1;
00263 
00264     /* Run hook functions. */
00265     hook = table->postReorderingHook;
00266     while (hook != NULL) {
00267         int res = (hook->f)(table,(void *)localTime);
00268         if (res == 0) return(0);
00269         hook = hook->next;
00270     }
00271     /* Update cumulative reordering time. */
00272     table->reordTime += util_cpu_time() - localTime;
00273 
00274     return(result);
00275 
00276 } /* end of Cudd_ReduceHeap */

00295 int
00296 Cudd_ShuffleHeap(
00297   DdManager * table /* DD manager */,
00298   int * permutation /* required variable permutation */)
00299 {
00300 
00301     int result;
00302 
00303     if (!ddReorderPreprocess(table)) return(0);
00304 
00305     result = ddShuffle(table,permutation);
00306 
00307     if (!ddReorderPostprocess(table)) return(0);
00308 
00309     return(result);
00310 
00311 } /* end of Cudd_ShuffleHeap */

00334 DdNode *
00335 cuddDynamicAllocNode(
00336   DdManager * table)
00337 {
00338     int     i;
00339 #ifdef __osf__
00340 #pragma pointer_size save
00341 #pragma pointer_size short
00342 #endif
00343     DdNode **mem, *list, *node;
00344 
00345     if (table->nextFree == NULL) {        /* memory is all full */
00346         mem = (DdNode **) ALLOC(DdNode, DD_MEM_CHUNK + 1);
00347 #ifdef __osf__
00348 #pragma pointer_size restore
00349 #endif
00350         if (mem == NULL) {
00351             table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00352 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
00353             (void) fprintf(stderr,"Memory in use = %ld\n", table->memused);
00354 #endif
00355             return(NULL);
00356         } else {
00357             table->memused += (DD_MEM_CHUNK + 1) * sizeof(DdNode);
00358             mem[0] = (DdNode *) table->memoryList;
00359             table->memoryList = mem;
00360 
00361             list = (DdNode *) mem;
00362 
00363             i = 1;
00364             do {
00365                 list[i].next = &list[i + 1];
00366             } while (++i < DD_MEM_CHUNK);
00367 
00368             list[DD_MEM_CHUNK].next = NULL;
00369 
00370             table->nextFree = &list[1];
00371         }
00372     } /* if table */
00373 
00374     node = table->nextFree;
00375     table->nextFree = node->next;
00376     return (node);
00377 
00378 } /* end of cuddDynamicAllocNode */

00380 
00400 int
00401 cuddSifting(
00402   DdManager * table,
00403   int  lower,
00404   int  upper)
00405 {
00406     int i;
00407     int *var;
00408     int size;
00409     int x;
00410     int result;
00411 #ifdef DD_STATS
00412     int previousSize;
00413 #endif
00414 
00415     size = table->size;
00416 
00417     /* Find order in which to sift variables. */
00418     var = NULL;
00419     entry = ALLOC(int,size);
00420     if (entry == NULL) {
00421         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00422         goto cuddSiftingOutOfMem;
00423     }
00424     var = ALLOC(int,size);
00425     if (var == NULL) {
00426         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00427         goto cuddSiftingOutOfMem;
00428     }
00429 
00430     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00431         x = table->perm[i];
00432         entry[i] = table->subtables[x].keys;
00433         var[i] = i;
00434     }
00435 
00436     qsort((void *)var,size,sizeof(int),(int (*)(const void *, const void *))ddUniqueCompare);
00437 
00438     /* Now sift. */
00439     for (i = 0; i < ddMin(table->siftMaxVar,size); i++) {
00440         if (ddTotalNumberSwapping >= table->siftMaxSwap)
00441             break;
00442         x = table->perm[var[i]];
00443         if (x < lower || x > upper) continue;
00444 #ifdef DD_STATS
00445         previousSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00446 #endif
00447         result = ddSiftingAux(table, x, lower, upper);
00448         if (!result) goto cuddSiftingOutOfMem;
00449 #ifdef DD_STATS
00450         if (table->keys < (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
00451             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00452         } else if (table->keys > (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
00453             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
00454             (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nSize increased from %d to %d while sifting variable %d\n", previousSize, table->keys - table->isolated, var[i]);
00455         } else {
00456             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00457         }
00458         fflush(stdout);
00459 #endif
00460     }
00461 
00462     FREE(var);
00463     FREE(entry);
00464 
00465     return(1);
00466 
00467 cuddSiftingOutOfMem:
00468 
00469     if (entry != NULL) FREE(entry);
00470     if (var != NULL) FREE(var);
00471 
00472     return(0); 
00473 
00474 } /* end of cuddSifting */
00475 
00476 
00495 int
00496 cuddSwapping(
00497   DdManager * table,
00498   int lower,
00499   int upper,
00500   Cudd_ReorderingType heuristic)
00501 {
00502     int i, j;
00503     int max, keys;
00504     int nvars;
00505     int x, y;
00506     int iterate;
00507     int previousSize;
00508     Move *moves, *move;
00509     int pivot = 0;
00510     int modulo;
00511     int result;
00512 
00513 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00514     /* Sanity check */
00515     assert(lower >= 0 && upper < table->size && lower <= upper);
00516 #endif
00517 
00518     nvars = upper - lower + 1;
00519     iterate = nvars;
00520 
00521     for (i = 0; i < iterate; i++) {
00522         if (ddTotalNumberSwapping >= table->siftMaxSwap)
00523             break;
00524         if (heuristic == CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM_PIVOT) {
00525             max = -1;
00526             for (j = lower; j <= upper; j++) {
00527                 if ((keys = table->subtables[j].keys) > max) {
00528                     max = keys;
00529                     pivot = j;
00530                 }
00531             }
00532 
00533             modulo = upper - pivot;
00534             if (modulo == 0) {
00535                 y = pivot;
00536             } else{
00537                 y = pivot + 1 + ((int) Cudd_Random() % modulo);
00538             }
00539 
00540             modulo = pivot - lower - 1;
00541             if (modulo < 1) {
00542                 x = lower;
00543             } else{
00544                 do {
00545                     x = (int) Cudd_Random() % modulo;
00546                 } while (x == y);
00547             }
00548         } else {
00549             x = ((int) Cudd_Random() % nvars) + lower;
00550             do {
00551                 y = ((int) Cudd_Random() % nvars) + lower;
00552             } while (x == y);
00553         }
00554         previousSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00555         moves = ddSwapAny(table,x,y);
00556         if (moves == NULL) goto cuddSwappingOutOfMem;
00557         result = ddSiftingBackward(table,previousSize,moves);
00558         if (!result) goto cuddSwappingOutOfMem;
00559         while (moves != NULL) {
00560             move = moves->next;
00561             cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00562             moves = move;
00563         }
00564 #ifdef DD_STATS
00565         if (table->keys < (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
00566             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00567         } else if (table->keys > (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
00568             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
00569         } else {
00570             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00571         }
00572         fflush(stdout);
00573 #endif
00574 #if 0
00575         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:t_SWAPPING %8d: tmp size\n",table->keys -
00576         table->isolated); 
00577 #endif
00578     }
00579 
00580     return(1);
00581 
00582 cuddSwappingOutOfMem:
00583     while (moves != NULL) {
00584         move = moves->next;
00585         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00586         moves = move;
00587     }
00588 
00589     return(0);
00590 
00591 } /* end of cuddSwapping */

00637 
00651 int
00652 cuddSwapInPlace(
00653   DdManager * table,
00654   int  x,
00655   int  y)
00656 {
00657 #ifdef __osf__
00658 #pragma pointer_size save
00659 #pragma pointer_size short
00660 #endif
00661     DdNode **xlist, **ylist;
00662 #ifdef __osf__
00663 #pragma pointer_size restore
00664 #endif
00665     int    xindex, yindex;
00666     int    xslots, yslots;
00667     int    xshift, yshift;
00668     int    oldxkeys, oldykeys;
00669     int    newxkeys, newykeys;
00670     int    comple, newcomplement;
00671     int    i;
00672     int    posn;
00673     int    isolated;
00674     DdNode *f,*f0,*f1,*f01,*f00,*f11,*f10,*newf1,*newf0;
00675     DdNode *g,*next,*last,*previous;
00676     DdNode *tmp;
00677 #if DD_DEBUG
00678     int    count,idcheck;
00679 #endif
00680 
00681 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00682     assert(x < y);
00683     assert(cuddNextHigh(table,x) == y);
00684     assert(table->subtables[x].keys != 0);
00685     assert(table->subtables[y].keys != 0);
00686     assert(table->subtables[x].dead == 0);
00687     assert(table->subtables[y].dead == 0);
00688 #endif
00689 
00690     ddTotalNumberSwapping++;
00691 
00692     /* Get parameters of x subtable. */
00693     xindex = table->invperm[x];
00694     xlist = table->subtables[x].nodelist; 
00695     oldxkeys = table->subtables[x].keys;
00696     xslots = table->subtables[x].slots;
00697     xshift = table->subtables[x].shift;
00698 
00699     /* Get parameters of y subtable. */
00700     yindex = table->invperm[y];
00701     ylist = table->subtables[y].nodelist;
00702     oldykeys = table->subtables[y].keys;
00703     yslots = table->subtables[y].slots;
00704     yshift = table->subtables[y].shift;
00705 
00706     if (!cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
00707 #ifdef DD_STATS
00708         ddTotalNISwaps++;
00709 #endif
00710         newxkeys = oldxkeys;
00711         newykeys = oldykeys;
00712     } else {
00713         newxkeys = 0;
00714         newykeys = oldykeys;
00715 
00716         /* Check whether the two projection functions involved in this
00717         ** swap are isolated. At the end, we'll be able to tell how many
00718         ** isolated projection functions are there by checking only these
00719         ** two functions again. This is done to eliminate the isolated
00720         ** projection functions from the node count.
00721         */
00722         isolated = - ((table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1) +
00723                      (table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1));
00724 
00725         /* The nodes in the x layer that do not depend on
00726         ** y will stay there; the others are put in a chain.
00727         ** The chain is handled as a FIFO; g points to the beginning and
00728         ** last points to the end.
00729         */
00730         g = last = NULL;
00731         for (i = 0; i < xslots; i++) {
00732             f = xlist[i];
00733             previous = NULL;
00734             while (f != NULL) {
00735                 next = f->next;
00736                 f1 = cuddT(f); f0 = cuddE(f);
00737                 if (f1->index != (DdHalfWord) yindex &&
00738                 Cudd_Regular(f0)->index != (DdHalfWord) yindex) { /* stays */
00739                     newxkeys++;
00740                     previous = f;
00741                 } else {
00742                     f->index = yindex;
00743                     if (previous == NULL) {
00744                         xlist[i] = next;
00745                     } else {
00746                         previous->next = next;
00747                     }
00748                     f->next = NULL;
00749                     if (last == NULL) {
00750                         last = g = f;
00751                     } else {
00752                         last->next = f;
00753                         last = f;
00754                     }
00755                 }
00756                 f = next;
00757             } /* while there are elements in the collision chain */
00758         } /* for each slot of the x subtable */
00759 
00760         /* Take care of the x nodes that must be re-expressed.
00761         ** They form a linked list pointed by g. Their index has been
00762         ** changed to yindex already.
00763         */
00764         f = g;
00765         while (f != NULL) {
00766             next = f->next;
00767             /* Find f1, f0, f11, f10, f01, f00. */
00768             f1 = cuddT(f);
00769 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00770             assert(!(Cudd_IsComplement(f1)));
00771 #endif
00772             if ((int) f1->index == yindex) {
00773                 f11 = cuddT(f1); f10 = cuddE(f1);
00774             } else {
00775                 f11 = f10 = f1;
00776             }
00777 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00778             assert(!(Cudd_IsComplement(f11)));
00779 #endif
00780             f0 = cuddE(f);
00781             comple = Cudd_IsComplement(f0);
00782             f0 = Cudd_Regular(f0);
00783             if ((int) f0->index == yindex) {
00784                 f01 = cuddT(f0); f00 = cuddE(f0);
00785             } else {
00786                 f01 = f00 = f0;
00787             }
00788             if (comple) {
00789                 f01 = Cudd_Not(f01);
00790                 f00 = Cudd_Not(f00);
00791             }
00792             /* Decrease ref count of f1. */
00793             cuddSatDec(f1->ref);
00794             /* Create the new T child. */
00795             if (f11 == f01) {
00796                 newf1 = f11;
00797                 cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00798             } else {
00799                 /* Check xlist for triple (xindex,f11,f01). */
00800                 posn = ddHash(f11, f01, xshift);
00801                 /* For each element newf1 in collision list xlist[posn]. */
00802                 newf1 = xlist[posn];
00803                 /* Search the collision chain. */
00804                 while (newf1 != NULL){
00805                     if (cuddT(newf1) == f11 && cuddE(newf1) == f01) {
00806                         cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00807                         break; /* match */
00808                     }
00809                     newf1 = newf1->next;
00810                 } /* while newf1 */ 
00811                 if (newf1 == NULL) { /* no match */
00812                     newf1 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00813                     if (newf1 == NULL)
00814                         goto cuddSwapOutOfMem;
00815                     newf1->index = xindex; newf1->ref = 1;
00816                     cuddT(newf1) = f11;
00817                     cuddE(newf1) = f01;
00818                     /* Insert newf1 in the collision list xlist[posn];
00819                     ** increase the ref counts of f11 and f01.
00820                     */
00821                     newxkeys++;
00822                     newf1->next = xlist[posn];
00823                     xlist[posn] = newf1;
00824                     cuddSatInc(f11->ref);
00825                     tmp = Cudd_Regular(f01);
00826                     cuddSatInc(tmp->ref);
00827                 }
00828             }
00829             cuddT(f) = newf1;
00830 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00831             assert(!(Cudd_IsComplement(newf1)));
00832 #endif
00833 
00834             /* Do the same for f0, keeping complement dots into account. */
00835             /* Decrease ref count of f0. */
00836             tmp = Cudd_Regular(f0);
00837             cuddSatDec(tmp->ref);
00838             /* Create the new E child. */
00839             if (f10 == f00) {
00840                 newf0 = f00;
00841                 tmp = Cudd_Regular(newf0);
00842                 cuddSatInc(tmp->ref); 
00843             } else {
00844                 /* make sure f10 is regular */
00845                 newcomplement = Cudd_IsComplement(f10);
00846                 if (newcomplement) {
00847                     f10 = Cudd_Not(f10);
00848                     f00 = Cudd_Not(f00);
00849                 }
00850                 /* Check xlist for triple (xindex,f10,f00). */
00851                 posn = ddHash(f10, f00, xshift);
00852                 /* For each element newf0 in collision list xlist[posn]. */
00853                 newf0 = xlist[posn];
00854                 /* Search the collision chain. */
00855                 while (newf0 != NULL) {
00856                     if (cuddT(newf0) == f10 && cuddE(newf0) == f00) {
00857                         cuddSatInc(newf0->ref); 
00858                         break; /* match */
00859                     }
00860                     newf0 = newf0->next;
00861                 } /* while newf0 */
00862                 if (newf0 == NULL) { /* no match */
00863                     newf0 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00864                     if (newf0 == NULL)
00865                         goto cuddSwapOutOfMem;
00866                     newf0->index = xindex; newf0->ref = 1;
00867                     cuddT(newf0) = f10;
00868                     cuddE(newf0) = f00;
00869                     /* Insert newf0 in the collision list xlist[posn];
00870                     ** increase the ref counts of f10 and f00.
00871                     */
00872                     newxkeys++;
00873                     newf0->next = xlist[posn];
00874                     xlist[posn] = newf0;
00875                     cuddSatInc(f10->ref);
00876                     tmp = Cudd_Regular(f00);
00877                     cuddSatInc(tmp->ref);
00878                 }
00879                 if (newcomplement) {
00880                     newf0 = Cudd_Not(newf0);
00881                 }
00882             }
00883             cuddE(f) = newf0;
00884 
00885             /* Insert the modified f in ylist.
00886             ** The modified f does not already exists in ylist.
00887             ** (Because of the uniqueness of the cofactors.)
00888             */
00889             posn = ddHash(newf1, newf0, yshift);
00890             newykeys++;
00891             f->next = ylist[posn];
00892             ylist[posn] = f;
00893             f = next;
00894         } /* while f != NULL */
00895 
00896         /* GC the y layer. */
00897 
00898         /* For each node f in ylist. */
00899         for (i = 0; i < yslots; i++) {
00900             previous = NULL;
00901             f = ylist[i];
00902             while (f != NULL) {
00903                 next = f->next;
00904                 if (f->ref == 0) {
00905                     tmp = cuddT(f);
00906                     cuddSatDec(tmp->ref);
00907                     tmp = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f));
00908                     cuddSatDec(tmp->ref);
00909                     cuddDeallocNode(table,f);
00910                     newykeys--;
00911                     if (previous == NULL) {
00912                         ylist[i] = next;
00913                     } else {
00914                         previous->next = next;
00915                     }
00916                 } else {
00917                     previous = f;
00918                 }
00919                 f = next;
00920             } /* while f */
00921         } /* for i */
00922 
00923 #if DD_DEBUG
00924 #if 0
00925         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Swapping %d and %d\n",x,y);
00926 #endif
00927         count = 0;
00928         idcheck = 0;
00929         for (i = 0; i < yslots; i++) {
00930             f = ylist[i];
00931             while (f != NULL) {
00932                 count++;
00933                 if (f->index != (DdHalfWord) yindex)
00934                     idcheck++;
00935                 f = f->next;
00936             }
00937         }
00938         if (count != newykeys) {
00939             fprintf(stdout,"Error in finding newykeys\toldykeys = %d\tnewykeys = %d\tactual = %d\n",oldykeys,newykeys,count);
00940         }
00941         if (idcheck != 0)
00942             fprintf(stdout,"Error in id's of ylist\twrong id's = %d\n",idcheck);
00943         count = 0;
00944         idcheck = 0;
00945         for (i = 0; i < xslots; i++) {
00946             f = xlist[i];
00947             while (f != NULL) {
00948                 count++;
00949                 if (f->index != (DdHalfWord) xindex)
00950                     idcheck++;
00951                 f = f->next;
00952             }
00953         }
00954         if (count != newxkeys) {
00955             fprintf(stdout,"Error in finding newxkeys\toldxkeys = %d \tnewxkeys = %d \tactual = %d\n",oldxkeys,newxkeys,count);
00956         }
00957         if (idcheck != 0)
00958             fprintf(stdout,"Error in id's of xlist\twrong id's = %d\n",idcheck);
00959 #endif
00960 
00961         isolated += (table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1) +
00962                     (table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1);
00963         table->isolated += isolated;
00964     }
00965 
00966     /* Set the appropriate fields in table. */
00967     table->subtables[x].nodelist = ylist;
00968     table->subtables[x].slots = yslots;
00969     table->subtables[x].shift = yshift;
00970     table->subtables[x].keys = newykeys;
00971     table->subtables[x].maxKeys = yslots * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_DENSITY;
00972 
00973     table->subtables[y].nodelist = xlist;
00974     table->subtables[y].slots = xslots;
00975     table->subtables[y].shift = xshift;
00976     table->subtables[y].keys = newxkeys;
00977     table->subtables[y].maxKeys = xslots * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_DENSITY;
00978 
00979     table->perm[xindex] = y; table->perm[yindex] = x;
00980     table->invperm[x] = yindex; table->invperm[y] = xindex;
00981 
00982     table->keys += newxkeys + newykeys - oldxkeys - oldykeys;
00983 
00984     return(table->keys - table->isolated);
00985 
00986 cuddSwapOutOfMem:
00987     (void) fprintf(stderr,"Error: cuddSwapInPlace() out of memory\n");
00988 
00989     return (0);
00990 
00991 } /* end of cuddSwapInPlace */
00992 
00993 
01017 int
01018 cuddBddAlignToZdd(
01019   DdManager * table /* DD manager */)
01020 {
01021     int *invperm;               /* permutation array */
01022     int M;                      /* ratio of ZDD variables to BDD variables */
01023     int i;                      /* loop index */
01024     int result;                 /* return value */
01025 
01026     /* We assume that a ratio of 0 is OK. */
01027     if (table->size == 0)
01028         return(1);
01029 
01030     M = table->sizeZ / table->size;
01031     /* Check whether the number of ZDD variables is a multiple of the
01032     ** number of BDD variables.
01033     */
01034     if (M * table->size != table->sizeZ)
01035         return(0);
01036     /* Create and initialize the inverse permutation array. */
01037     invperm = ALLOC(int,table->size);
01038     if (invperm == NULL) {
01039         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
01040         return(0);
01041     }
01042     for (i = 0; i < table->sizeZ; i += M) {
01043         int indexZ = table->invpermZ[i];
01044         int index  = indexZ / M;
01045         invperm[i / M] = index;
01046     }
01047     /* Eliminate dead nodes. Do not scan the cache again, because we
01048     ** assume that Cudd_zddReduceHeap has already cleared it.
01049     */
01050     cuddGarbageCollect(table,0);
01051 
01052     /* Initialize number of isolated projection functions. */
01053     table->isolated = 0;
01054     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++) {
01055         if (table->vars[i]->ref == 1) table->isolated++;
01056     }
01057 
01058     /* Initialize the interaction matrix. */
01059     result = cuddInitInteract(table);
01060     if (result == 0) return(0);
01061 
01062     result = ddShuffle(table, invperm);
01063     FREE(invperm);
01064     /* Free interaction matrix. */
01065     FREE(table->interact);
01066     /* Fix the BDD variable group tree. */
01067     bddFixTree(table,table->tree);
01068     return(result);
01069 
01070 } /* end of cuddBddAlignToZdd */
01071 
01072 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01073 /* Definition of static functions                                            */
01074 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01075 
01076 
01089 static int
01090 ddUniqueCompare(
01091   int * ptrX,
01092   int * ptrY)
01093 {
01094 #if 0
01095     if (entry[*ptrY] == entry[*ptrX]) {
01096         return((*ptrX) - (*ptrY));
01097     }
01098 #endif
01099     return(entry[*ptrY] - entry[*ptrX]);
01100 
01101 } /* end of ddUniqueCompare */
01102 
01103 
01113 static Move *
01114 ddSwapAny(
01115   DdManager * table,
01116   int  x,
01117   int  y)
01118 {
01119     Move        *move, *moves;
01120     int         xRef,yRef;
01121     int         xNext,yNext;
01122     int         size;
01123     int         limitSize;
01124     int         tmp;
01125 
01126     if (x >y) {
01127         tmp = x; x = y; y = tmp;
01128     }
01129 
01130     xRef = x; yRef = y;
01131 
01132     xNext = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01133     yNext = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01134     moves = NULL;
01135     limitSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
01136 
01137     for (;;) {
01138         if ( xNext == yNext) {
01139             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,xNext);
01140             if (size == 0) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01141             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);                        
01142             if (move == NULL) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01143             move->x = x;
01144             move->y = xNext;
01145             move->size = size; 
01146             move->next = moves;
01147             moves = move;
01148 
01149             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,yNext,y);
01150             if (size == 0) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01151             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01152             if (move == NULL) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01153             move->x = yNext;
01154             move->y = y;
01155             move->size = size; 
01156             move->next = moves;
01157             moves = move;
01158 
01159             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,xNext);
01160             if (size == 0) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01161             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01162             if (move == NULL) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01163             move->x = x;
01164             move->y = xNext;
01165             move->size = size;
01166             move->next = moves;
01167             moves = move;
01168 
01169             tmp = x; x = y; y = tmp;
01170 
01171         } else if (x == yNext) {
01172             
01173             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,xNext);
01174             if (size == 0) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01175             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01176             if (move == NULL) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01177             move->x = x;
01178             move->y = xNext;
01179             move->size = size;
01180             move->next = moves;
01181             moves = move;
01182 
01183             tmp = x; x = y; y = tmp;
01184 
01185         } else {
01186             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,xNext);
01187             if (size == 0) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01188             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01189             if (move == NULL) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01190             move->x = x;
01191             move->y = xNext;
01192             move->size = size; 
01193             move->next = moves;
01194             moves = move;
01195 
01196             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,yNext,y);
01197             if (size == 0) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01198             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01199             if (move == NULL) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01200             move->x = yNext;
01201             move->y = y;
01202             move->size = size;
01203             move->next = moves;
01204             moves = move;
01205 
01206             x = xNext;
01207             y = yNext;
01208         }
01209 
01210         xNext = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01211         yNext = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01212         if (xNext > yRef) break;
01213 
01214         if ((double) size > table->maxGrowth * (double) limitSize) break;
01215         if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
01216     }
01217     if (yNext>=xRef) {
01218         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,yNext,y);
01219         if (size == 0) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01220         move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01221         if (move == NULL) goto ddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01222         move->x = yNext;
01223         move->y = y;
01224         move->size = size; 
01225         move->next = moves;
01226         moves = move;
01227     }
01228 
01229     return(moves);
01230     
01231 ddSwapAnyOutOfMem:
01232     while (moves != NULL) {
01233         move = moves->next;
01234         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
01235         moves = move;
01236     }
01237     return(NULL);
01238 
01239 } /* end of ddSwapAny */
01240 
01241 
01254 static int
01255 ddSiftingAux(
01256   DdManager * table,
01257   int  x,
01258   int  xLow,
01259   int  xHigh)
01260 {
01261 
01262     Move        *move;
01263     Move        *moveUp;                /* list of up moves */
01264     Move        *moveDown;              /* list of down moves */
01265     int         initialSize;
01266     int         result;
01267 
01268     initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
01269 
01270     moveDown = NULL;
01271     moveUp = NULL;
01272 
01273     if (x == xLow) {
01274         moveDown = ddSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh);
01275         /* At this point x --> xHigh unless bounding occurred. */
01276         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01277         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */  
01278         result = ddSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveDown);
01279         if (!result) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01280 
01281     } else if (x == xHigh) {
01282         moveUp = ddSiftingUp(table,x,xLow);
01283         /* At this point x --> xLow unless bounding occurred. */
01284         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01285         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */
01286         result = ddSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveUp);
01287         if (!result) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01288 
01289     } else if ((x - xLow) > (xHigh - x)) { /* must go down first: shorter */
01290         moveDown = ddSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh);
01291         /* At this point x --> xHigh unless bounding occurred. */
01292         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01293         if (moveDown != NULL) {
01294             x = moveDown->y;
01295         }
01296         moveUp = ddSiftingUp(table,x,xLow);
01297         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01298         /* Move backward and stop at best position */   
01299         result = ddSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveUp);
01300         if (!result) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01301 
01302     } else { /* must go up first: shorter */
01303         moveUp = ddSiftingUp(table,x,xLow);
01304         /* At this point x --> xLow unless bounding occurred. */
01305         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01306         if (moveUp != NULL) {
01307             x = moveUp->x;
01308         }
01309         moveDown = ddSiftingDown(table,x,xHigh);
01310         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01311         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */  
01312         result = ddSiftingBackward(table,initialSize,moveDown);
01313         if (!result) goto ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01314     }
01315 
01316     while (moveDown != NULL) {
01317         move = moveDown->next;
01318         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveDown);
01319         moveDown = move;
01320     }
01321     while (moveUp != NULL) {
01322         move = moveUp->next;
01323         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveUp);
01324         moveUp = move;
01325     }
01326 
01327     return(1);
01328 
01329 ddSiftingAuxOutOfMem:
01330     while (moveDown != NULL) {
01331         move = moveDown->next;
01332         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveDown);
01333         moveDown = move;
01334     }
01335     while (moveUp != NULL) {
01336         move = moveUp->next;
01337         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moveUp);
01338         moveUp = move;
01339     }
01340 
01341     return(0);
01342 
01343 } /* end of ddSiftingAux */
01344 
01345 
01357 static Move *
01358 ddSiftingUp(
01359   DdManager * table,
01360   int  y,
01361   int  xLow)
01362 {
01363     Move        *moves;
01364     Move        *move;
01365     int         x;
01366     int         size;
01367     int         limitSize;
01368     int         xindex, yindex;
01369     int         isolated;
01370     int         L;      /* lower bound on DD size */
01371 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01372     int checkL;
01373     int z;
01374     int zindex;
01375 #endif
01376 
01377     moves = NULL;
01378     yindex = table->invperm[y];
01379 
01380     /* Initialize the lower bound.
01381     ** The part of the DD below y will not change.
01382     ** The part of the DD above y that does not interact with y will not
01383     ** change. The rest may vanish in the best case, except for
01384     ** the nodes at level xLow, which will not vanish, regardless.
01385     */
01386     limitSize = L = table->keys - table->isolated;
01387     for (x = xLow + 1; x < y; x++) {
01388         xindex = table->invperm[x];
01389         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
01390             isolated = table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1;
01391             L -= table->subtables[x].keys - isolated;
01392         }
01393     }
01394     isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
01395     L -= table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
01396 
01397     x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01398     while (x >= xLow && L <= limitSize) {
01399         xindex = table->invperm[x];
01400 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01401         checkL = table->keys - table->isolated;
01402         for (z = xLow + 1; z < y; z++) {
01403             zindex = table->invperm[z];
01404             if (cuddTestInteract(table,zindex,yindex)) {
01405                 isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01406                 checkL -= table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01407             }
01408         }
01409         isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
01410         checkL -= table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
01411         assert(L == checkL);
01412 #endif
01413         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01414         if (size == 0) goto ddSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01415         /* Update the lower bound. */
01416         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
01417             isolated = table->vars[xindex]->ref == 1;
01418             L += table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
01419         }
01420         move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01421         if (move == NULL) goto ddSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01422         move->x = x;
01423         move->y = y;
01424         move->size = size;
01425         move->next = moves;
01426         moves = move;
01427         if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth) break;
01428         if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
01429         y = x;
01430         x = cuddNextLow(table,y);
01431     }
01432     return(moves);
01433 
01434 ddSiftingUpOutOfMem:
01435     while (moves != NULL) {
01436         move = moves->next;
01437         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
01438         moves = move;
01439     }
01440     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
01441 
01442 } /* end of ddSiftingUp */
01443     
01444 
01457 static Move *
01458 ddSiftingDown(
01459   DdManager * table,
01460   int  x,
01461   int  xHigh)
01462 {
01463     Move        *moves;
01464     Move        *move;
01465     int         y;
01466     int         size;
01467     int         R;      /* upper bound on node decrease */
01468     int         limitSize;
01469     int         xindex, yindex;
01470     int         isolated;
01471 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01472     int         checkR;
01473     int         z;
01474     int         zindex;
01475 #endif
01476 
01477     moves = NULL;
01478     /* Initialize R */
01479     xindex = table->invperm[x];
01480     limitSize = size = table->keys - table->isolated;
01481     R = 0;
01482     for (y = xHigh; y > x; y--) {
01483         yindex = table->invperm[y];
01484         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
01485             isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
01486             R += table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
01487         }
01488     }
01489 
01490     y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01491     while (y <= xHigh && size - R < limitSize) {
01492 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01493         checkR = 0;
01494         for (z = xHigh; z > x; z--) {
01495             zindex = table->invperm[z];
01496             if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,zindex)) {
01497                 isolated = table->vars[zindex]->ref == 1;
01498                 checkR += table->subtables[z].keys - isolated;
01499             }
01500         }
01501         assert(R == checkR);
01502 #endif
01503         /* Update upper bound on node decrease. */
01504         yindex = table->invperm[y];
01505         if (cuddTestInteract(table,xindex,yindex)) {
01506             isolated = table->vars[yindex]->ref == 1;
01507             R -= table->subtables[y].keys - isolated;
01508         }
01509         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
01510         if (size == 0) goto ddSiftingDownOutOfMem; 
01511         move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01512         if (move == NULL) goto ddSiftingDownOutOfMem;
01513         move->x = x;
01514         move->y = y;
01515         move->size = size;
01516         move->next = moves;
01517         moves = move;
01518         if ((double) size > (double) limitSize * table->maxGrowth) break;
01519         if (size < limitSize) limitSize = size;
01520         x = y;
01521         y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
01522     }
01523     return(moves);
01524 
01525 ddSiftingDownOutOfMem:
01526     while (moves != NULL) {
01527         move = moves->next;
01528         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
01529         moves = move;
01530     }
01531     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
01532 
01533 } /* end of ddSiftingDown */
01534 
01535 
01549 static int
01550 ddSiftingBackward(
01551   DdManager * table,
01552   int  size,
01553   Move * moves)
01554 {
01555     Move *move;
01556     int res;
01557 
01558     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
01559         if (move->size < size) {
01560             size = move->size;
01561         }
01562     }
01563 
01564     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
01565         if (move->size == size) return(1);
01566         res = cuddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
01567         if (!res) return(0);    
01568     }
01569 
01570     return(1);
01571 
01572 } /* end of ddSiftingBackward */
01573 
01574 
01588 static int
01589 ddReorderPreprocess(
01590   DdManager * table)
01591 {
01592     int i;
01593     int res;
01594 
01595     /* Clear the cache. */
01596     cuddCacheFlush(table);
01597     cuddLocalCacheClearAll(table);
01598 
01599     /* Eliminate dead nodes. Do not scan the cache again. */
01600     cuddGarbageCollect(table,0);
01601 
01602     /* Initialize number of isolated projection functions. */
01603     table->isolated = 0;
01604     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++) {
01605         if (table->vars[i]->ref == 1) table->isolated++;
01606     }
01607 
01608     /* Initialize the interaction matrix. */
01609     res = cuddInitInteract(table);
01610     if (res == 0) return(0);
01611 
01612     return(1);
01613 
01614 } /* end of ddReorderPreprocess */
01615 
01616 
01631 static int
01632 ddReorderPostprocess(
01633   DdManager * table)
01634 {
01635     int i, j, posn;
01636 #ifdef __osf__
01637 #pragma pointer_size save
01638 #pragma pointer_size short
01639 #endif
01640     DdNode **nodelist, **oldnodelist;
01641 #ifdef __osf__
01642 #pragma pointer_size restore
01643 #endif
01644     DdNode *node, *next;
01645     unsigned int slots, oldslots;
01646     extern void (*MMoutOfMemory)(long);
01647     void (*saveHandler)(long);
01648 
01649 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
01650     (void) fflush(stdout);
01651 #endif
01652 
01653     /* Free interaction matrix. */
01654     FREE(table->interact);
01655 
01656     /* If we have very many reclaimed nodes, we do not want to shrink
01657     ** the subtables, because this will lead to more garbage
01658     ** collections. More garbage collections mean shorter mean life for
01659     ** nodes with zero reference count; hence lower probability of finding
01660     ** a result in the cache.
01661     */
01662     if (table->reclaimed > table->allocated * 0.5) return(1);
01663 
01664     /* Resize subtables. */
01665     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++) {
01666         int shift;
01667         oldslots = table->subtables[i].slots;
01668         if (oldslots < table->subtables[i].keys * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_SPARSITY ||
01669             oldslots <= CUDD_UNIQUE_SLOTS) continue;
01670         oldnodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
01671         slots = oldslots >> 1;
01672         saveHandler = MMoutOfMemory;
01673         MMoutOfMemory = Cudd_OutOfMem;
01674 #ifdef __osf__
01675 #pragma pointer_size save
01676 #pragma pointer_size short
01677 #endif
01678         nodelist = ALLOC(DdNode *, slots);
01679 #ifdef __osf__
01680 #pragma pointer_size restore
01681 #endif
01682         MMoutOfMemory = saveHandler;
01683         if (nodelist == NULL) {
01684             return(1);
01685         }
01686         table->subtables[i].nodelist = nodelist;
01687         table->subtables[i].slots = slots;
01688         table->subtables[i].shift++;
01689         table->subtables[i].maxKeys = slots * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_DENSITY;
01690 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
01691         (void) fprintf(stderr,"shrunk layer %d (%d keys) from %d to %d slots\n",
01692                     i, table->subtables[i].keys, oldslots, slots);
01693 #endif
01694 
01695         for (j = 0; (unsigned) j < slots; j++) {
01696             nodelist[j] = NULL;
01697         }
01698         shift = table->subtables[i].shift;
01699         for (j = 0; (unsigned) j < oldslots; j++) {
01700             node = oldnodelist[j];
01701             while (node != NULL) {
01702                 next = node->next;
01703                 posn = ddHash(cuddT(node), cuddE(node), shift);
01704                 node->next = nodelist[posn];
01705                 nodelist[posn] = node;
01706                 node = next;
01707             }
01708         }
01709         FREE(oldnodelist);
01710 
01711         table->memused += ((long) slots - (long) oldslots) * sizeof(DdNode *);
01712         table->slots += slots - oldslots;
01713         table->minDead = (table->gcPercent * table->slots) / 100;
01714         table->maxCache = ddMin(table->maxCacheHard,table->slots);
01715     }
01716     /* We don't look at the constant subtable, because it is not
01717     ** affected by reordering.
01718     */
01719 
01720     return(1);
01721 
01722 } /* end of ddReorderPostprocess */
01723 
01724 
01741 static int
01742 ddShuffle(
01743   DdManager * table,
01744   int * permutation)
01745 {
01746     int         index;
01747     int         level;
01748     int         position;
01749     int         numvars;
01750     int         result;
01751 #ifdef DD_STATS
01752     long        localTime;
01753     int         initialSize;
01754     int         finalSize;
01755     int         previousSize;
01756 #endif
01757 
01758     ddTotalNumberSwapping = 0;
01759 #ifdef DD_STATS
01760     localTime = util_cpu_time();
01761     initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
01762     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_SHUFFLE %8d: initial size\n",initialSize); 
01763     ddTotalNISwaps = 0;
01764 #endif
01765 
01766     numvars = table->size;
01767 
01768     for (level = 0; level < numvars; level++) {
01769         index = permutation[level];
01770         position = table->perm[index];
01771 #ifdef DD_STATS
01772         previousSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
01773 #endif
01774         result = ddSiftUp(table,position,level);
01775         if (!result) return(0);
01776 #ifdef DD_STATS
01777         if (table->keys < (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
01778             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
01779         } else if (table->keys > (unsigned) previousSize + table->isolated) {
01780             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
01781         } else {
01782             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
01783         }
01784         fflush(stdout);
01785 #endif
01786     }
01787 
01788 #ifdef DD_STATS
01789     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
01790     finalSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
01791     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:F_SHUFFLE %8d: final size\n",finalSize); 
01792     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:T_SHUFFLE %8g: total time (sec)\n",
01793         ((double)(util_cpu_time() - localTime)/1000.0)); 
01794     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:N_SHUFFLE %8d: total swaps\n",ddTotalNumberSwapping);
01795     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:M_SHUFFLE %8d: NI swaps\n",ddTotalNISwaps);
01796 #endif
01797 
01798     return(1);
01799 
01800 } /* end of ddShuffle */
01801 
01802 
01816 static int
01817 ddSiftUp(
01818   DdManager * table,
01819   int  x,
01820   int  xLow)
01821 {
01822     int        y;
01823     int        size;
01824 
01825     y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
01826     while (y >= xLow) {
01827         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,y,x);
01828         if (size == 0) {
01829             return(0);
01830         }
01831         x = y;
01832         y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
01833     }
01834     return(1);
01835 
01836 } /* end of ddSiftUp */
01837 
01838 
01852 static void
01853 bddFixTree(
01854   DdManager * table,
01855   MtrNode * treenode)
01856 {
01857     if (treenode == NULL) return;
01858     treenode->low = ((int) treenode->index < table->size) ?
01859         table->perm[treenode->index] : treenode->index;
01860     if (treenode->child != NULL) {
01861         bddFixTree(table, treenode->child);
01862     }
01863     if (treenode->younger != NULL)
01864         bddFixTree(table, treenode->younger);
01865     if (treenode->parent != NULL && treenode->low < treenode->parent->low) {
01866         treenode->parent->low = treenode->low;
01867         treenode->parent->index = treenode->index;
01868     }
01869     return;
01870 
01871 } /* end of bddFixTree */

Generated on Sat Aug 30 17:58:07 2014 for libbdd by  1.4.7
